item.title: Carina add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "One has so many more opinions about what has gone wrong than about what is perfect." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Carina add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Carina add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Carina add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Carina add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Carina add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Carina add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Carina add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Carina add a quote by Vittorio Alfieri
item.description: "First thoughts are not always the best." -- Vittorio Alfieri

item.title: Carina add a quote by Kasimir Malevich
item.description: "In 1913, trying desperately to liberate art from the ballast of the representational world, I sought refuge in the form of the square." -- Kasimir Malevich

item.title: Carina add a quote by Jean-Michel Basquiat
item.description: "Fire will attract more attention than any other cry for help." -- Jean-Michel Basquiat

item.title: Carina add a quote by Miranda July
item.description: "I laughed and said, Life is easy. What I meant was, Life is easy with you here, and when you leave, it will be hard again." -- Miranda July
